name: 2 Roll
description:
2 Roll is about two separate souls faded to pass through doors wich are only opened by their eternal partner.
How long can you delay the inevitable?

Keep falling through the plataforms and don't let anyone reach the thorns at the top.

There are two buttons, left and right:
Right open the doors at the left side and rotate it anticlockwise
Left open the doors on the right side and rotate it clockwise.
